==Japanese==
{{ja-kanjitab|よ|げん|しゃ|yomi=on}}

===Etymology===
Compound of {{compound|予言|tr1=yogen|t1=prediction, foretelling|者|tr2=sha|t2=person|lang=ja|sort=よげんしゃ}}.

===Noun===
{{ja-noun|よげんしゃ}}

# [[foreteller]]

====Synonyms====
* {{ja-r|預言者|よげんしゃ}}: a [[prophet]]

====Usage notes====
In speech, this word is identical to {{l|ja|預言者}}. In writing, {{l|ja|予言者}} is more neutral about the kind of prediction, whereas {{l|ja|預言者}} carries more religious overtones.
